document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the Scathophagidae (Diptera) of the Palaearctic region, with notes on their taxonomy and faunistics

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the Scathophagidae (Diptera) of the Palaearctic region, with notes on their taxonomy and faunistics

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Cordylura apicalis Meigen, 1826: 236
. SYNTYPES : J ♀ , ‘Beide Geschlechter [= both sexes]’, type locality not given, ‘Aus dem Baumhauerischen Museum, auch von Herrn Wiedemann [= from the Baumhauer’s Museum, also from Mr. Wiedemann]’ (current depository unknown).

subSubSection.paragraph: Note. The original paper stated: ‘15. Cord. apicalis . Wied . [= Wiedemann]’, but. the text of the original description does not confirm Wiedemann’s authorship. I therefore accept Meigen as the single author of the description (see ICZN 1999 :Article 50).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Gonarcticus kerteszi Szilády. Synonymized
by
SZILÁDY (1926: 180)
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Note. The reference and year of the original description are still unknown.According to L. Papp (2006 , pers. comm.), it is not sure at all Szilády had ever described such a species and possibly labelled specimen(s) as such only.

New records.
CROATIA :
Lissa [= Hvar Is. ], without data, 1 J, det. Schiner ( NHMW : old collection)
.
IRAQ :
Mosul , edge of river,
7.iv.1988
, 1 ♀ , Olejníček leg. ( FSPC ). ITA- LY: Benedetto , 10 km N, damp valley,
3.viii.1988
, 1 ♀ , Barták leg. ( FSPC )
.
RUSSIA :
EUROPEAN PART, Moskva – Orechovo ,
23.v.1988
, 1 J 1 ♀
;
Skorotovo ( 56°41′N 36°53′E ),
30.v.1989
, 1 J 1 ♀
;
Moskva – Lozinsk ,
26.v.1989
, 1 ♀
;
Abramtsevo ( 56°14′N 37°59′E ),
28.v.1989
, 1 ♀ , all Barták leg. ( FSPC )
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Gonarcticus Becker, 1894
Gonarcticus Becker, 1894: 103
. Type species.
Scatomyza antennata Zetterstedt, 1838: 724
; by original designation.

Cordylura abdominalis
Zetterstedt, 1846: 2080
. HOLOTYPE : J, Sweden , ‘ Hab. in Lapponia Lulensis , in cacumine alpis Snjerrack [= found in Lule Lappmark, in peaks of the Snjerrack Mts.],
13.-15.vii.1843
, Boheman inventa [= leg.]’ (probably MZLU).

Scatomyza antennata Zetterstedt, 1838: 724
. SYNTYPES : J ♀ , Sweden , ‘Delacarlia [= Dalarna ], Lapponia maxime meridionalis [= southernmost Lappland], Boheman 1836 [leg.]’ (probably MZLU).

Cordylura validicornis Zetterstedt, 1846: 2065
. HOLOTYPE : J, Sweden , ‘Habitat in Lapponia Lulensis […] in alpis Snjerrack [= found in Lule Lappmark [...] in the Snjerrack Mts.]’ (probably MZLU). Synonymized by
SCHINER (1864a: 19)
.

EUROPEAN PART, Abramtsevo ( 56°14′N 37°59′E ), along brook,
